name: when-in-rome
description: AI-Driven Code Stylist that enforces team conventions. After all, when in rome you should do as the Romans do.
author: Tristan Deane

whenInRome.notificationInterval.description: Interval in milliseconds to control the frequency of test reminder notifications for modified files.

whenInRome.maxNumberOfProblems.description: Controls the maximum number of problems produced and displayed by the server.

whenInRome.trace.server.description: Traces the communication between VS Code and the language server.

whenInRome.isJavascriptEnabled.description: Enable/disable JavaScript When in Rome extension.

whenInRome.isTypescriptEnabled.description: Enable/disable TypeScript When in Rome extension.

whenInRome.isPythonEnabled.description: Enable/disable Python When in Rome extension.

whenInRome.onlyCheckNewCode.description: Check only new or modified code.

scripts.client:build: cd client && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.server:build: cd server && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.build: npm run client:build && npm run server:build
scripts.postinstall: cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install && cd ..
